---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---


```{r}
width <- floor((ncol(df) - 2) * .625)
df <- masterDF
colors <- c("r", "o", "y", "g", "b", "i", "v")
colorCount <- rep(0, 7)
for(i in 1:7)
  for(r in 2:nrow(df)-1)
    for(c in 2:ncol(df)-1)
      if(colors[i] == df[r,c])
        colorCount[i] <- colorCount[i] + 1

paste(ceiling(colorCount / width), collapse="")
```
